##### Format Data
```{r}

joined_long <- left_join( Relationships, Independent_recode, by = "Independent_variable") %>% left_join(Dependent_recode, by = "Dependent_variable") %>%  select(Title, Independent_variable_recode, Dependent_variable_recode) %>% distinct() %>% group_by(Independent_variable_recode, Dependent_variable_recode) %>% summarise(count = n()) 


#ordering independent and dependent variables

indi_order <- group_by(joined_long, Independent_variable_recode) %>%  summarise(total = sum(count)) %>% arrange(total, by_group = TRUE) %>% pull(Independent_variable_recode)

dep_order <- group_by(joined_long, Dependent_variable_recode) %>%
summarise(total = sum(count)) %>% arrange(total, by_group = TRUE) %>% pull(Dependent_variable_recode)


```

#### Bubble plot

```{r}

joined_long %>% mutate(Independent_variable_recode = factor(Independent_variable_recode,levels = indi_order), Dependent_variable_recode = factor(Dependent_variable_recode,levels = rev(dep_order))) %>% ggplot(aes(x = Dependent_variable_recode, y = Independent_variable_recode, color = count)) + geom_point(aes(size = count)) + theme_bw() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = .5 ,  hjust = 1)) + scale_x_discrete(labels = label_wrap(20)) + scale_y_discrete(labels = label_wrap(30)) + guides(size = FALSE) + xlab("Dependent variable") + ylab("Independent variable")  +
scale_colour_paletteer_c("ggthemes::Classic Area Red-Green", breaks =c(9,7,5,3,1)) + scale_size_continuous(breaks = c(9,7,5,3,1)) + guides(color = guide_legend(title = "Number of\nstudies"), size = guide_legend(title = "Number of\nstudies")) 


```

#### SANKEY DIAGRAMS


```{r}
# create nodes dataframe

IV <- unique(joined_long$Independent_variable_recode)
DV <- unique(joined_long$Dependent_variable_recode)
node <- data.frame(key = 0:32, variable = as.factor(c(as.character(IV), as.character(DV))))


#create links dataframe and rename 
links <- joined_long %>% inner_join(node,  by = c("Independent_variable_recode" = "variable")) %>% rename(IV_key = key) %>% 
  inner_join(node,  by = c("Dependent_variable_recode" = "variable")) %>% rename(DV_key = key)


# sankeyNetwork(Links = links, Nodes = node, Source = 'IV_key', 
#               Target = 'DV_key', Value = 'count', NodeID = "variable", 
#               fontSize = 12, nodeWidth = 20, 
#               fontFamily = "sans serif", iterations = 0)


```

```{r}
#LinkGroup
#when we bring in significant and non
#https://www.r-graph-gallery.com/322-custom-colours-in-sankey-diagram.html    

#rating significance

joined_long_sig <- Relationships %>% filter(Relationship == "significant") %>%
  left_join(Independent_recode, by = "Independent_variable") %>%
  left_join(Dependent_recode, by = "Dependent_variable") %>%
  select(Independent_variable_recode, Dependent_variable_recode) %>%
  group_by(Independent_variable_recode, Dependent_variable_recode) %>%
  summarise(significant = n()) %>%
  full_join(joined_long) %>% 
  replace(is.na(.), 0 ) %>%
  mutate(significance = if_else(significant == 0, "not_sig", if_else(significant == count, "sig", "mixed")))

# create nodes dataframe

IVsig <- unique(joined_long_sig$Independent_variable_recode)
DVsig <- unique(joined_long_sig$Dependent_variable_recode)

nodesig <- data.frame(key = 0:32, variable = as.factor(c(as.character(IVsig), as.character(DVsig))))

linkssig <- joined_long_sig %>% inner_join(nodesig,  by = c("Independent_variable_recode" = "variable")) %>% rename(IV_key = key) %>% 
  inner_join(nodesig,  by = c("Dependent_variable_recode" = "variable")) %>% rename(DV_key = key)

linkssig <- data.frame(linkssig)
```

##### The following Sankey is the one to use---features red, grey and green to dipict significance
```{r}

my_color <- 'd3.scaleOrdinal() .domain(["node_group","not_sig","mixed","sig"]) .range(["tan","red","dimgrey", "green"])'

sankeyD3::sankeyNetwork(Links = linkssig,
              Nodes = nodesig,
              Source = 'IV_key', 
              Target = 'DV_key',
              Value = 'count',
              NodeID = "variable", 
              LinkGroup = "significance",
              NodeGroup = "group",
              colourScale = my_color,
              fontSize = 12,
              fontFamily = "sans-serif",
              orderByPath = TRUE,
              showNodeValues = FALSE,
              nodePadding = 10,
              nodeWidth = 30,
              align="center",
              linkOpacity = 0.4,
              curvature = 0.4,
              dragY = TRUE,
              title = NULL,
              iterations = 0)




```
